mapper.sql: select no, title, nickname, to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as regDate, view_cnt as viewCnt, recommend_cnt as recommendCnt, rownum as rNum from ssh_build
mapper.insert: insert into ssh_build(no, title, user_no, nickname, password, content) values(seq_ssh_build_no.nextval, #{title}, #{userNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{nickname}, #{password, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content})
mapper.select: where user_no = #{no} order by no desc
